entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 late in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023
